1.title: Pela Toca do Coelho
1.plot: HD. 'Falling Down the Rabbit Hole.' In the series premiere, Alice is a Brazilian tour guide who travels to Sao Paulo for her father's funeral.

2.title: O Tesouro de Alice
2.plot: HD. 'Alice's Treasure.' (Season One) In Sao Paulo, Alice finds a freelancing job while trying to solve the inheritance issues.

3.title: O Retorno de Elvira Cipriani
3.plot: HD. 'The Return of Elvira Cipriani.' (Season One) After Henrique ends things, Alice is assigned to escort a movie star from the '60s.

4.title: No Jardim das Flores Perdidas
4.plot: HD. 'The Garden of the Lost Flowers.' (Season One) Alice meets charming millionaire Lorenzo Marquez at the launch of a new armored car.

5.title: Os Peixinhos Dourados de Dona Sumiko
5.plot: HD. 'Mr. Sumiko's Golden Fish.' (Season One) As a big fashion event approaches, Alice sees Lorenzo again and is unable to resist him. Both of them end up in bed.

6.title: O Lado Escuro do Espelho
6.plot: HD. 'The Dark Side of the Mirror.' (Season One) Alice talks to Lorenzo and he strongly reaffirms that he doesn't want a baby.

7.title: Wonderland
7.plot: HD. 'Wonderland.' (Season One) Alice decides to take her life in a new direction. To raise money, she organizes a party honoring her father.

8.title: A Guerra de Alice
8.plot: HD. 'Alice's War.' (Season One) Alice has been in Sao Paulo for six months and the Wonderland Wrestling party is finally happening.

9.title: Em Busca do Ouro
9.plot: Alice is experiencing a conflict: she is full of debts after throwing the party at the storehouse. However, she wants to be independent, to pay her bills and not to depend on her aunt's and friends' help any longer.

10.title: Na Cidade de Alice
10.plot: HD. 'In Alice's City.' Alice's grandmother comes for a visit with her brother Duda, but she cannot give them the attention they deserve.

11.title: A Mil Quilômetros por Hora
11.plot: HD. 'In a Rush.' Alice fails to attend her grandma's farewell dinner leading her family to an unfortunate realization.

12.title: Em Queda Livre
12.plot: HD. 'Free Falling.' A fatigued Alice starts taking energy tablets; meanwhile, some Italian businessmen are interested in using the storehouse.

13.title: À Flor da Pele
13.plot: HD. 'Highly Sensitive.' Season One finale. It's been a year since Alice arrived in Sao Paulo and she realizes she needs to change her life.

imdb.plot outline: The adventures of a small town 25 year old woman who moves to São Paulo after receiving a small inheritance. Alice is influenced by new friends and experiences that lead her to make substantial changes in her life as she adapts a cosmopolitan lifestyle.
imdb.title: Alice
plot: _Alice_ (qv) is a 26-year old woman, who moves to São Paulo after her father's unexpected death. In this intense and eclectic city, she starts to live life to the fullest, discover pleasures, chalk up successes and fearlessly face her failures.::HBO Latin America

The adventures of a small town 25 year old woman who moves to São Paulo after receiving a small inheritance. _Alice_ (qv) is influenced by new friends and experiences that lead her to make substantial changes in her life as she adapts a cosmopolitan lifestyle.

Sensuality and drama intertwine in a breathtaking and humorous story. _Alice_ (qv) is a 26 year-old woman that lives a simple life in Palmas, a region of northern Brazil. After four years of dating Henrique, they decide to move in together, but her father s unexpected death changes everything, taking _Alice_ (qv) all the way to Sao Paulo, where she gathers with her stepmother, aunt, and sister. _Alice_ (qv) stays longer than planned, and she finds new loves and friends, awakening to a brand new world. In the middle of urban chaos, _Alice_ (qv) re-discovers the city, her country, and ultimately, herself.
synopsis: From Palmas, Alice brings to São Paulo a foreseeable future where everything is already set. She lost her mother when she was a sophomore in college, where she studied communications. She lives with her grandmother, Glícia, and her younger brother, Duda. After graduating, Alice works as a tour guide at the Palmas Office of Tourism. She is about to move in with her boyfriend, Henrique to a small apartment in downtown Palmas. The loss of her father will be the cause of a huge shift in Alice's well-planned future. Arriving in São Paulo, the stability of her existence is challenged as she is exposed to various paths and discovers that the world extends beyond the boundaries of Palmas. She is seduced and swallowed up by São Paulo. While getting lost in the city, Alice finds herself much more lost than she imagined. She winds up settling in the city, where she seeks to find herself, forever changing the course of her life.At the same time that Alice discovers the outlines of this city that welcomes and repels her, she undergoes a process of inner discovery of her identity, re-encountering the stories of a father whom she hardly knew and growing closer to a half-sister she wishes to get to know. The story's drama builds gradually, as Alice plunges into her still somewhat nebulous, rough and indistinct internal reality.At the end of this journey, Alice overcomes the obstacles that the city imposes on her and becomes a more confident and mature woman, affirming herself by achieving her independence, both financially and emotionally. As we accompany Alice on her experiences in São Paulo, we also get a glimpse of the everyday life of a restless metropolis - a cosmopolitan, contemporary, intense city that is the setting a character in our story. Soon we will be immersed in a delicate study of the human relationships that are established in this effervescent megalopolis.The series is a slice, a fragment, of this metropolis and its countless possibilities. Alice is just one more among many other anonymous souls in search of answers, love, and challenges. She is a young woman who wants to live life at full throttle, discover pleasures, chalk up successes and fearlessly face her failures.Contrary to most of the trends in Brazilian television dramas, where conflicts arise from elements extraneous to the characters, in this series the viewer will witness the internal reality of Alice and of the other characters through their inner conflicts. In this universe, there are no villains and no heroes.The series will cast a loving look at a world that is not built on a value judgment of its characters. There are no good or bad guys, just human beings, both good and bad. In this sense, São Paulo also plays an important role, as the place onto which Alice projects her feelings. Often, the city will be seen and felt from her point of view, thus revealing the leading character's state of mind.
